
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(lib-MC-MCParser)
target_compile_options(lib-MC-MCParser PRIVATE
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(lib-MC-MCParser PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm16/lib/MC/MCParser
)
target_link_libraries(lib-MC-MCParser PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  contrib-libs-llvm16
  llvm16-lib-MC
  llvm16-lib-Support
  llvm16-lib-TargetParser
)
target_sources(lib-MC-MCParser PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm16/lib/MC/MCParser/AsmLexer.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm16/lib/MC/MCParser/AsmParser.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm16/lib/MC/MCParser/COFFAsmParser.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm16/lib/MC/MCParser/COFFMasmParser.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm16/lib/MC/MCParser/DarwinAsmParser.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm16/lib/MC/MCParser/ELFAsmParser.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm16/lib/MC/MCParser/GOFFAsmParser.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm16/lib/MC/MCParser/MCAsmLexer.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm16/lib/MC/MCParser/MCAsmParser.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm16/lib/MC/MCParser/MCAsmParserExtension.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm16/lib/MC/MCParser/MCTargetAsmParser.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm16/lib/MC/MCParser/MasmParser.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm16/lib/MC/MCParser/WasmAsmParser.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm16/lib/MC/MCParser/XCOFFAsmParser.cpp
)
